text: int fun ( int a [ ] , int i , int n ) { if ( i >= n ) return 0 ; int l , r ; l = a [ i ] + fun ( a , 2 * i + 1 , n ) ; r = a [ i ] + fun ( a , 2 * i + 2 , n ) ; if ( l > r ) return l ; else return r ; } int main ( ) { int t , i , m ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & m ) ; int n = ( m * ( m + 1 ) ) / 2 ; int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , fun ( a , 0 , n ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
